data.text:
@gillianoberholzer 

The Case that Lyle assigned to "Neil Capturer" this morning (previous log) is still assigned and not captured yet.

Please log in and completed the case (previous log) that Lyle assigned this morning.
Once that Case is done then we can assigned the Case of this log.


There is an incomplete Captured record assign to user "Gordon Capturer" as well.


Incomplete Cases Assigned to:

1.Neil Capturer
2.Gordon Capturer


@lylenutt
